Welcome to American Portfolios Houston. American Portfolios Houston is here when its time to get serious with your investments. American Portfolios Houston Director, Michael Stewart, is a seasoned Financial Advisor with 40+ years of experience.
Schedule your appointment today!

pages.metaDescription: First off, my first priority is helping you take care of yourself and your family. We want to learn more about your personal situation, identify your dreams and goals, and understand your tolerance for risk.

findings.title: Missing Meta Descriptions
findings.description: 34 pages lack meta descriptions, reducing click-through rates from search results.
findings.recommendation: Add compelling meta descriptions (120-160 characters) that include target keywords.

findings.title: Missing Canonical Tags
findings.description: 32 pages lack canonical tags, risking duplicate content issues.
findings.recommendation: Add self-referencing canonical tags to all pages.

findings.title: Pages Blocked from Indexing
findings.description: 2 pages have noindex directive, preventing them from appearing in search results.
findings.recommendation: Review and remove noindex from pages that should be indexed.

findings.title: Redirect Chains Detected
findings.description: 1 URLs redirect to different final URLs, potentially slowing crawling.
findings.recommendation: Update internal links to point to final URLs. Consolidate redirect chains.

findings.title: Missing H1 Headings
findings.description: 7 pages lack an H1 heading, which defines the main topic for search engines.
findings.recommendation: Add a single, descriptive H1 to each page that includes the primary keyword.

findings.title: Images Missing Alt Text
findings.description: 3 images across 1 pages lack alt text, hurting accessibility and image SEO.
findings.recommendation: Add descriptive alt text to all images that conveys their content or function.
findings.impactEstimate: Impacts accessibility and image search visibility

findings.title: Missing LocalBusiness Schema
findings.description: No LocalBusiness, Organization, or Service schema found on the site.
findings.recommendation: Add LocalBusiness or Organization schema with complete NAP, hours, and service area.
findings.impactEstimate: Essential for rich results and entity recognition

findings.title: Missing FAQ Content and Schema
findings.description: Site has no FAQPage schema, missing opportunities for featured snippets and AI answers.
findings.recommendation: Add FAQ sections to key pages with FAQPage schema markup.
findings.impactEstimate: High impact on AI answer eligibility and voice search
